calc_force_server.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 #!/usr/bin/env python
00002 
00003 #Service Provider for the body forces calculation routine
00004 
00005 import rospy
00006 from math import pow
00007 from math import pi
00008 from math import sin
00009 from math import cos
00010 from last_letter.srv import *
00011 import tf.transformations
00012 from geometry_msgs.msg import Vector3
00013 from nav_msgs.msg import Odometry
00014 
00015 
00016 def calc_force_callback(req):
00017         
00018         #rospy.loginfo('Entered callback')#
00019         states = req.states
00020         inputs = req.inputs
00021 
00022         #Request air data from getAirData server
00023         airdata = getAirData(states)
00024         airspeed = airdata.airspeed
00025         alpha = airdata.alpha
00026         beta = airdata.beta
00027         #rospy.loginfo('airspeed:%g, alpha:%g, beta:%g',airspeed, alpha, beta)#
00028 
00029         #Split Control input values
00030         deltaa = inputs[0]
00031         deltae = inputs[1]
00032         deltat = inputs[2]
00033         deltar = inputs[3]
00034 
00035         #Request Lift and Drag alpha-coefficients from the corresponding server
00036         c_lift_a = getLiftAlpha(alpha)
00037         c_drag_a = getDragAlpha(alpha)
00038         #rospy.loginfo('lift_a:%g, drag_a:%g',c_lift_a, c_drag_a)#
00039 
00040         #Read from parameter server
00041         rho = rospy.get_param('world/rho')
00042         g = rospy.get_param('world/g')
00043         m = rospy.get_param('airframe/m')
00044         c_lift_q = rospy.get_param('airframe/c_lift_q') 
00045         c_lift_deltae = rospy.get_param('airframe/c_lift_deltae')
00046         c_drag_q = rospy.get_param('airframe/c_drag_q')
00047         c_drag_deltae = rospy.get_param('airframe/c_drag_deltae')
00048         c = rospy.get_param('airframe/c')
00049         b = rospy.get_param('airframe/b')
00050         s = rospy.get_param('airframe/s')
00051         c_y_0 = rospy.get_param('airframe/c_y_0')
00052         c_y_b = rospy.get_param('airframe/c_y_b')
00053         c_y_p = rospy.get_param('airframe/c_y_p')
00054         c_y_r = rospy.get_param('airframe/c_y_r')
00055         c_y_deltaa = rospy.get_param('airframe/c_y_deltaa')
00056         c_y_deltar = rospy.get_param('airframe/c_y_deltar')
00057         s_prop = rospy.get_param('motor/s_prop')
00058         c_prop = rospy.get_param('motor/c_prop')
00059         k_motor = rospy.get_param('motor/k_motor')
00060 
00061         #Convert coefficients to the body frame 
00062         c_x_a = -c_drag_a*cos(alpha)-c_lift_a*sin(alpha)        
00063         c_x_q = -c_drag_q*cos(alpha)-c_lift_q*sin(alpha)
00064         c_x_deltae = -c_drag_deltae*cos(alpha)-c_lift_deltae*sin(alpha)
00065         c_z_a = -c_drag_a*sin(alpha)-c_lift_a*cos(alpha)
00066         c_z_q = -c_drag_q*sin(alpha)-c_lift_q*cos(alpha)
00067         c_z_deltae = -c_drag_deltae*sin(alpha)-c_lift_deltae*cos(alpha)
00068 
00069         #Read orientation and convert to Euler angles
00070         q1 = states.pose.pose.orientation.x
00071         q2 = states.pose.pose.orientation.y
00072         q3 = states.pose.pose.orientation.z
00073         q4 = states.pose.pose.orientation.w
00074         (phi, theta, psi) = tf.transformations.euler_from_quaternion([q1,q2,q3,q4])
00075         #rospy.logerr('%g, %g, %g', phi, theta, psi)
00076 
00077         #Read angular rates 
00078         p = states.twist.twist.angular.x
00079         q = states.twist.twist.angular.y
00080         r = states.twist.twist.angular.z
00081         
00082         #Calculate Gravity force
00083         gx = -m*g*sin(theta)
00084         gy = m*g*cos(theta)*sin(phi)
00085         gz = m*g*cos(theta)*cos(phi)
00086 
00087         #Calculate Aerodynamic force
00088         qbar = 1.0/2.0*rho*pow(airspeed,2)*s #Calculate dynamic pressure
00089         #rospy.logerr('qbar:%g, rho:%g, s:%g, airspeed:%g',qbar, rho, s, airspeed)
00090         if airspeed==0:
00091                 (ax, ay, az) = (0, 0, 0)
00092         else:
00093                 ax = qbar*(c_x_a + c_x_q*c*q/(2*airspeed) + c_x_deltae*deltae)
00094                 ay = qbar*(c_y_0 + c_y_b*beta + c_y_p*b*p/(2*airspeed) + c_y_r*b*r/(2*airspeed) + c_y_deltaa*deltaa + c_y_deltar*deltar)
00095                 az = qbar*(c_z_a + c_z_q*c*q/(2*airspeed) + c_z_deltae*deltae)
00096         #rospy.logerr('c_x_a:%g, c_z_a:%g',c_x_a, c_z_a)#
00097         #rospy.logerr('ax:%g, ay:%g, az:%g', ax, ay, az)#
00098         
00099         #Calculate Thrust force
00100         tx = 1.0/2.0*rho*s_prop*c_prop*(pow(k_motor*deltat,2)-pow(airspeed,2))
00101         ty = 0
00102         tz = 0
00103 
00104         #Sum forces
00105         fx = gx+ax+tx
00106         fy = gy+ay+ty
00107         fz = gz+az+tz
00108         
00109         response = Vector3(fx, fy, fz)
00110         
00111         return response
00112 
00113 def getAirData(Odo):
00114     rospy.wait_for_service('calc_air_data')
00115     try:
00116                 calcAirData = rospy.ServiceProxy('calc_air_data',calc_air_data)
00117                 return calcAirData(Odo.twist.twist.linear)
00118     except rospy.ServiceException, e:
00119         rospy.logerr("Service call failed: %s"%e)
00120 
00121 def getLiftAlpha(alpha):
00122         rospy.wait_for_service('c_lift_a')
00123         try:
00124                 calcLiftAlpha = rospy.ServiceProxy('c_lift_a',c_lift_a)
00125                 return calcLiftAlpha(alpha).c_lift_a
00126         except rospy.ServiceException, e:
00127                 rospy.logerr("Service call failed: %s"%e)
00128 
00129 def getDragAlpha(alpha):
00130         rospy.wait_for_service('c_drag_a')
00131         try:
00132                 calcDragAlpha = rospy.ServiceProxy('c_drag_a',c_drag_a)
00133                 return calcDragAlpha(alpha).c_drag_a
00134         except rospy.ServiceException, e:
00135                 rospy.logerr("Service call failed: %s"%e)
00136 
00137 
00138 if __name__=='__main__':
00139         try:
00140                 rospy.init_node('calc_force_server')
00141                 s = rospy.Service('calc_force', calc_force, calc_force_callback)
00142                 rospy.loginfo('calc_force service running')
00143                 while not rospy.is_shutdown():
00144                         rospy.spin()
00145                                 
00146         except rospy.ROSInterruptException:
00147                 pass
